assessment_item.title: जोडकर लिखिए।
assessment_item.body:
{"data":{"plugin":{"id":"org.ekstep.questionunit.mtf","version":"1.1","templateId":"horizontalMTF"},"data":{"question":{"text":"

जोडकर लिखिए।

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":""},"option":{"optionsLHS":[{"text":"इंटरनेट ने पूरे विश्व को","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","index":1,"$$hashKey":"object:3817"},{"text":"इंटरनेट द्वारा कोई भी","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","index":2,"$$hashKey":"object:3818"},{"text":"इंटरनेट समाज के लिए","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","index":3,"$$hashKey":"object:3819"},{"text":"इंटरनेट वजह से","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","index":4,"$$hashKey":"object:3849"},{"text":"इंटरनेट से सबको","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","index":5,"$$hashKey":"object:3859"}],"optionsRHS":[{"text":"एक छोटे गाँव का रूप दे","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","mapIndex":1},{"text":"बिल भर सकते हैं।","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","mapIndex":2},{"text":"बहुत बडा वरदान है।","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","mapIndex":3},{"text":"पैरसी, हैकिंग बढ रही हैं।","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","mapIndex":4},{"text":"सचेत रहना चाहिए।","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","mapIndex":5}],"questionCount":0},"media":[]},"config":{"metadata":{"max_score":5,"isShuffleOption":false,"isPartialScore":true,"templateType":"Horizontal","name":"जोडकर लिखिए। ","title":"जोडकर लिखिए। ","board":"State (Karnataka)","medium":"Hindi","gradeLevel":["Class 10"],"subject":"Hindi","qlevel":"MEDIUM","category":"MTF"},"max_time":0,"max_score":1,"partial_scoring":true,"layout":"Horizontal","isShuffleOption":false,"questionCount":1},"media":[]}}
assessment_item.name: जोडकर लिखिए।
